data.title: 2711: Withdrawing
data.body: I still think this is a good idea, but I'm no longer actively championing it.  If anyone wants to take up ownership of this EIP or something similar to it please do so!

data.body: The idea is great, I see great usage. It would be great if someone could take over.

All tests passed; auto-merging...

data.title: 2711: Withdrawing
data.body: I still think this is a good idea, but I'm no longer actively championing it.  If anyone wants to take up ownership of this EIP or something similar to it please do so!
